title: The Avengers
summary: ##Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: Inside Out
summary: ##After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

title: TrainWreck
summary: ##Having thought that monogamy was never possible, a commitment-phobic career woman may have to face her fears when she meets a good guy.

title: The Hunger Games
summary: ##Katniss Everdeen voluntarily takes her younger sister's place in the Hunger Games, a televised competition in which two teenagers from each of the twelve Districts of Panem are chosen at random to fight to the death.
